mapper.select: SELECT r.tag_id,max(r.TAG_TIME) TAG_TIME FROM READE_IO_TIME r where r.DEVICE_PURPOSE='in' and r.tag_id = #{tag_Id} GROUP BY r.TAG_ID ORDER BY r.TAG_ID
SELECT r.tag_id,max(r.TAG_TIME) TAG_TIME FROM READE_IO_TIME r where r.DEVICE_PURPOSE='out' and r.tag_id = #{tag_Id} GROUP BY r.TAG_ID ORDER BY r.TAG_ID

SELECT * from (SELECT r.tag_id,max(r.TAG_TIME) intime FROM READE_IO_TIME r where r.DEVICE_PURPOSE='in' GROUP BY r.tag_id ORDER BY r.TAG_ID) a ,(SELECT r.tag_id,max(r.TAG_TIME) outtime FROM READE_IO_TIME r where r.DEVICE_PURPOSE='out' GROUP BY r.tag_id ORDER BY r.TAG_ID) b WHERE a.tag_id=b.Tag_id ORDER BY a.tag_id
SELECT min(r.tag_time) from READE_IO_TIME r where r.DEVICE_PURPOSE=#{device_Purpose} and r.tag_id=#{tag_Id}
mapper.insert: insert into READE_IO_TIME (RFID_IP, DEVICE_PURPOSE, TAG_ID, TAG_TIME) values (#{rfid_Ip}, #{device_Purpose}, #{tag_Id}, #{tag_Time})
mapper.update: UPDATE READE_IO_TIME a set a.tag_time=systimestamp where a.tag_id=#{tag_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM READE_IO_TIME t where t.TAG_ID=#{tag_Id}
